member.name: P:CFX.AreYouThereResponse.RequestTargetAddress
member.summary: Optional field if a single network host is servicing multiple endpoints. For AMQP, corresponds to the AMQP 1.0 target address.

member.name: T:CFX.CFXEnvelope
member.summary: The class is the outer envelope or container in which all CFX messages are enclosed for transmission. Common properties, such as a globally unique identifier (ID) and the timestamp for the message (TimeStamp), are defined by this container class and are included with all CFX message transmissions.

member.name: P:CFX.CFXEnvelope.MessageBody
member.summary: The message payload (The CFX message enclosed in this envelope).

member.name: P:CFX.EndpointConnected.RequestTargetAddress
member.summary: Optional field if a single network host is servicing multiple endpoints. For AMQP, corresponds to the AMQP 1.0 target address.

member.name: P:CFX.GetEndpointInformationResponse.RequestTargetAddress
member.summary: Optional field if a single network host is servicing multiple endpoints. For AMQP, corresponds to the AMQP 1.0 target address.

member.name: P:CFX.GetEndpointInformationResponse.UniqueIdentifier
member.summary: The barcode, RFID, or other unique identifier that is used to identify this machine / endpoint.

member.name: P:CFX.Materials.Storage.GetLoadedMaterialsRequest.LocationIdentifiers
member.summary: An optional list of specific locations in which the requestor is interested. If empty, all materials loaded at the Endpoint are returned.

member.name: P:CFX.Materials.Storage.MaterialCarriersLoaded.Carriers
member.summary: There are two usage cases are available for this message: 1) Load MaterialCarrier directly to Endpoint (LocationIdentifier = Endpoint Slot Identifier, CarrierInformation = Carrier to be loaded) 2) Load MateriialCarrier to another MaterialCarrier (LocationIdentifier = Identifier of new parent carrier, CarrierInformation = Identifier of carrier to be loaded)

member.name: P:CFX.Materials.Storage.MaterialCarriersUnloaded.CarrierIdentifiers
member.summary: List of carriers to be unloaded. NOTE - This message DOES NOT mean that the MaterialPackage is unloaded from the MaterialCarrier. Only that the MaterialCarrier is unloaded from its parent (slot on and Endpoint, or another MaterialCarrier).

member.name: P:CFX.Materials.Storage.MaterialsLoaded.Materials
member.summary: There are three usage cases are available for this message: 1) Load MaterialPackage directly to Endpoint (LocationIdentifier = Endpoint Slot Identifier, CarrierInformation = null) 2) Load MaterialPackage to MaterialCarrier (LocationIdentifier = null, CarrierInformation = Identifier of carrier to be loaded) 3) Load MaterialPackage to MaterialCarrier AND Load MaterialCarrier to Endpoint (LocationIdentifier = Endpoint Slot Identifier, CarrierInformation = Identifier of carrier to be loaded)

member.name: P:CFX.Materials.Storage.MaterialsUnloaded.MaterialPackageIdentifiers
member.summary: List of material packages to be unloaded.

member.name: P:CFX.Production.GetRequiredSetupRequest.Lane
member.summary: An optional property designating the specific Lane.

member.name: P:CFX.Production.GetRequiredSetupRequest.Stage
member.summary: An optional property designating the specific Stage.

member.name: P:CFX.Production.GetRequiredSetupResponse.RecipeName
member.summary: The name of the recipe associated with the required setup.

member.name: P:CFX.Production.GetRequiredSetupResponse.Lane
member.summary: An optional property designating the specific Lane associated with this setup.

member.name: P:CFX.Production.GetRequiredSetupResponse.Stage
member.summary: An optional property designating the specific Stage associated with this setup.

member.name: P:CFX.Production.ReadingsRecorded.TransactionId
member.summary: If the readings related to this message are associated with a work transaction, this property contains the Id of the transaction.

member.name: P:CFX.Production.ReadingsRecorded.Readings
member.summary: A collection of readings to be recorded.

member.name: P:CFX.Production.RecipeModified.ModifiedBy
member.summary: The name of the user who performed the modification.

member.name: P:CFX.Production.RecipeModified.Reason
member.summary: The reason for the modification.

member.name: P:CFX.Production.RecipeModified.Notes
member.summary: Any additional notes provided by the user who performed the modification.

member.name: T:CFX.Production.SetupRequirementsChanged
member.summary: Indicates that the setup requirements of a particular Endpoint have changed. If the Lane and Stage properties are left empty, the setup requirements of the entire Endpoint have been impacted. Otherwise, only the specified Lane and/or Stage is impacted.

member.name: P:CFX.Production.SetupRequirementsChanged.Lane
member.summary: An optional property designating the affected Lane.

member.name: P:CFX.Production.SetupRequirementsChanged.Stage
member.summary: An optional property designating the affected Stage.

member.name: P:CFX.Production.UpdateRecipeRequest.Overwrite
member.summary: If set to true, any existing Recipe at the Endpoint with the same name will be replaced by the Recipe provided in this request. If set to False, the update request will not succeed if a Recipe with the same name exists at the Endpoint.

member.name: P:CFX.Production.UpdateRecipeRequest.Recipe
member.summary: The new Recipe to be sent to the Endpoint.

member.name: T:CFX.Production.WorkStageStarted
member.summary: Indicates that work has begun on one or more production units at a particular work center.

member.name: T:CFX.Production.WorkStarted
member.summary: Indicates that work has begun on one or more production units at a particular work center.

member.name: P:CFX.Sensor.Identification.IdentifiersRead.PrimaryIdentifier
member.summary: The barcode, RFID, etc. that was most recently acquired by the scanner / reader. If a single production unit is moving through the process, this would be the actual unique identifier of that individual unition unit. However, if multiple production units are moving through the process as a group (as in the case of a PCB panel, a fixture, or any sort of carrier), this would be an identifier that represents the entire group of units, such as a carrier UID, a PCB panel UID, etc.

member.name: P:CFX.Sensor.Identification.IdentifiersRead.Units
member.summary: An optional list of actual production unit identifiers, in the case that multiple production units are moving through the process, and the sensor is capable if reading multiple identifiers.

member.name: P:CFX.Sensor.Identification.IdentifyUnitsResponse.PrimaryIdentifier
member.summary: The barcode, RFID, etc. that was most recently acquired by the scanner / reader. If a single production unit is moving through the process, this would be the actual unique identifier of that individual unition unit. However, if multiple production units are moving through the process as a group (as in the case of a PCB panel, a fixture, or any sort of carrier), this would be an identifier that represents the entire group of units, such as a carrier UID, a PCB panel UID, etc.

member.name: P:CFX.Sensor.Identification.IdentifyUnitsResponse.Units
member.summary: An optional list of actual production unit identifiers, in the case that multiple production units are moving through the process, and the sensor is capable if reading multiple identifiers.

member.name: T:CFX.Structures.ActorType
member.summary: Types of Operators

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.ActorType.Human
member.summary: A human being is performing the operation

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.ActorType.Robot
member.summary: A robotic / automated device is performing the operation

member.name: T:CFX.Structures.BlockReason
member.summary: Reasons why a unit is blocked

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.BlockReason.Unspecified
member.summary: No reason specified

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.BlockReason.SuspectedProblem
member.summary: There exists suspicion that the unit may be defective or otherwise problematic

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.BlockReason.Defective
member.summary: The unit is known to be defective.

member.name: T:CFX.Structures.ComponentDesignator
member.summary: Represents and identifies a particular component (instance of a part) on a production unit, or a particular aspect of a particular component, such as an individual pin of an electronic component.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.ComponentDesignator.ReferenceDesignator
member.summary:
A dot (".") and comma (",") delimeted string identifying a particular component on a production unit.
Examples:
C34 U2.11 (component U2, Pin 11) U2.1-45 (component U2, Pins 1 to 45) U2.1,2 (component U2, Pin1 1 and 2)

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.ComponentDesignator.PartNumber
member.summary: The internal part number of the designated component.

member.name: T:CFX.Structures.DataType
member.summary: Types of data

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.DataType.String
member.summary: Text based data

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.DataType.StringList
member.summary: A list of test based data

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.DataType.Numeric
member.summary: Numeric data (floating point)

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.DataType.Integer
member.summary: Numeric data (integer / non-floating point)

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.DataType.Boolean
member.summary: True or False data

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.DataType.Enumeration
member.summary: A single value selected from a list of possibilities

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.DataType.Binary
member.summary: An array of bytes

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.DataType.Guid
member.summary: A 128-bit globallyt unique integer based numeric value

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Defect.Priority
member.summary: The priority of this defect as compared to other defects discovered for this unit. A priority of 1 indicates the highest priority.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Defect.ConfidenceLevel
member.summary: A floating point number from 1 to 100 indicating the level of confidence in the validity of this defect. Intended to be used by humans that screen the results of inspections made by automated inspection equipment, which may produce false defects from time to time.

member.name: T:CFX.Structures.FaultCause
member.summary: Possible causes of a fault that causes a stoppage in production

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.FaultCause.LoadError
member.summary: A problem occurred loading a unit

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.FaultCause.UnloadError
member.summary: A problem occurred unloading a unit

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.FaultCause.AutoSafetyStop
member.summary: A safety stop was automatically triggered by automation

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.FaultCause.SafetyStop
member.summary: A safety stop was manually triggered by a human being

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.FaultCause.QualityCheck
member.summary: A stop was triggered due to a quality related problem

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.FaultCause.RemoteStop
member.summary: A stop was triggered remotely

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.FaultCause.MechanicalFailure
member.summary: A stop was induced by a mechanical failure

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.FaultCause.SoftwareFailure
member.summary: A stop was induced by a software failure

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.FaultCause.PowerFailure
member.summary: A stop was induced by a power failure

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.FaultCause.MissingDocumentation
member.summary: A stop was induced because required documentation was missing

member.name: T:CFX.Structures.FaultSeverity
member.summary: The severity of a fault

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.FaultSeverity.Information
member.summary: Informational purposes. No stoppage.

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.FaultSeverity.Warning
member.summary: Warning. No stoppage

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.FaultSeverity.Error
member.summary: Error. Stoppage.

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.FaultSeverity.Alarm
member.summary: Safety related Error. Stoppage.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Image.MimeType
member.summary: The MIME type of the binary image data contained by the ImageData property.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Image.ImageData
member.summary: A binary representation of the image.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Inspection.UniqueIdentifier
member.summary: A unique indentifier describing a particular instance of an inspection was made. Each new occurrence or recurrence of this same inspection gets a new unique identifier.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Inspection.TestProcedure
member.summary: Procedure to be followed to perform this inspection (primarily for human driven inspection).

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Inspection.Error
member.summary: In the case that the inspection cannot be completed, the error that was the cause of this outcome.

member.name: T:CFX.Structures.LockReason
member.summary: Reason for a production lock condition

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.LockReason.QualityIssue
member.summary: Production locked due to quality related issue

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.LockReason.PreventativeMaintenance
member.summary: Production locked due to preventative maintenance

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.LockReason.UnscheduledMaintenance
member.summary: Production locked due to unscheduled maintenance

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.LockReason.GeneralLock
member.summary: Production locked for unspecified reason

member.name: T:CFX.Structures.LogImportance
member.summary: Importance of an event log entry

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.LogImportance.Debug
member.summary: Useful for debugging purposes

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.LogImportance.Information
member.summary: General information

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.LogImportance.Warning
member.summary: Warning

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.LogImportance.Error
member.summary: Recoverable error

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.LogImportance.Fatal
member.summary: Error that caused an unrecoverable condition

member.name: T:CFX.Structures.MaintenanceType
member.summary: Types of Maintenance

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.MaintenanceType.Preventive
member.summary: Maintenance intended to prevent breakdowns that have not yet occurred

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.MaintenanceType.Inspection
member.summary: Inspection intended to prevent breakdowns that have not yet occurred

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.MaintenanceType.Repair
member.summary: Repair of a breakdown that has occurred.

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.MaintenanceType.Test
member.summary: Testing of repairs made

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.MaterialLocation.LocationIdentifier
member.summary: The unique identifier of the location on the Endpoint where the MaterialPackage is to be loaded. If this property is left empty, the MaterialPackage will only be loaded to the carrier specified by the CarrierInformation property, and not to an Endpoint.

member.name: T:CFX.Structures.MaterialModifyReason
member.summary: Reason why the attributes of a material package were modified

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.MaterialModifyReason.Unspecified
member.summary: No reason specified

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.MaterialModifyReason.InformationWasIncorrect
member.summary: Correction of incorrect information

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.MaterialModifyReason.ManualCountAndQuantityUpdate
member.summary: Quantity updated after manual count / measurement

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.MaterialSetupRequirement.Position
member.summary: The position where the required material must be installed on the Endpoint (optional). Where applicable, a dot (".") notation should be utilized to designate specific positions. Examples: MODULE1.FRONT.Pos23, STAGE2.BANK1.Pos44, etc.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.MaterialSetupRequirement.PartNumber
member.summary: The internal part number of the part that must be loaded at this position.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.MaterialSetupRequirement.ApprovedAlternateParts
member.summary: An optional list of approved alternate parts (internal part numbers) that may be substituted for the primary part.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.MaterialSetupRequirement.ApprovedManufacturerParts
member.summary: An optional list of specific manufacturer part numbers that must be utilzed. When specified, a part will only be acceptable if both its internal part number matches the PartNumber property (or Alternates), AND its manufacturer part number matches one of the parts specified in the ApprovedManufacturerParts property.

member.name: T:CFX.Structures.MaterialStatus
member.summary: Status of a material package

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.MaterialStatus.Active
member.summary: Material is available for use in production

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.MaterialStatus.Blocked
member.summary: Material has been blocked, and should not be used in production

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.MaterialStatus.Depleted
member.summary: Material has been exhausted, and can no longer be used in production

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Measurement.UniqueIdentifier
member.summary: A unique identifier that for this particular measurement instance (new and unique each time a new measurement is made or repeated).

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Measurement.MeasurementName
member.summary: A name that uniquely describes the test or measurement that was performed.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Measurement.TimeRecorded
member.summary: The date/time when this Measurement was recorded.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Measurement.Sequence
P:CFX.Structures.Measurement.Result
member.summary: An enumeration indicating whether or not this reading is considered acceptable.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Measurement.Components
member.summary: An optional list of components (instance of a part) on a production unit(s) to be associated with this reading.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Measurement.ValueMimeType
member.summary: If the Reading is of type DataType.Binary, this property contains the MIME type of the binary data contained in the BinaryValue property.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Measurement.BinaryValue
member.summary: If the Reading is of type DataType.Binary, this property contains the binary representation of the value.

member.name: T:CFX.Structures.MSDState
member.summary: Possible states of packages of moisture sensitive devices

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.MSDState.Unspecified
member.summary: Unspecified state

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.MSDState.NeverOpened
member.summary: Sealed and never opened.

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.MSDState.Exposed
member.summary: Open and exposed to the atmosphere

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.MSDState.InDryStorage
member.summary: Open but stored in low humidity environment

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.MSDState.Expired
member.summary: Exposed to atmosphere/moisture beyond acceptable limits.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Operator.OperatorIdentifier
member.summary: An optional unique identifier for the Operator

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Reading.ReadingIdentifier
member.summary: A name that uniquely describes the test or measurement that was performed.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Reading.TimeRecorded
member.summary: The date/time when this Reading was recorded.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Reading.ReadingSequence
P:CFX.Structures.Reading.Result
member.summary: An enumeration indicating whether or not this reading is considered acceptable.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Reading.UnitIdentifier
member.summary: In the case that this Reading is associated to a particular production unit, and the Reading is not associated with a work transaction, this property contains the unique identifier of the production unit.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Reading.UnitPositionNumber
member.summary: In the case that this Reading is associated with a particular production unit, and the Reading is associated with a work transaction, this property contains the position number of the unit as it relates to the transaction. If a position number is not specified, it is assumed that the Reading applies to all units associated with the transaction.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Reading.Components
member.summary: An optional list of components (instance of a part) on a production unit(s) to be associated with this reading.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Reading.ValueMimeType
member.summary: If the Reading is of type DataType.Binary, this property contains the MIME type of the binary data contained in the BinaryValue property.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Reading.BinaryValue
member.summary: If the Reading is of type DataType.Binary, this property contains the binary representation of the value.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Recipe.MimeType
member.summary: The MIME type of the binary data contained by the RecipeData property.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Recipe.RecipeData
member.summary: A binary representation of the recipe data.

member.name: T:CFX.Structures.RecipeModificationReason
member.summary: Reasons why a recipe was modified at an endpoint

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.RecipeModificationReason.Unspecified
member.summary: Unspecified reason

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.RecipeModificationReason.NewRecipe
member.summary: Newly created recipe

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.RecipeModificationReason.NewRevision
member.summary: New revision of an existing recipe

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.RecipeModificationReason.UpdatedGeometry
member.summary: Geometric information was updated

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.RecipeModificationReason.UpdatedBOM
member.summary: Bill of Materials information was updated

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.RecipeModificationReason.PositionalCorrection
member.summary: Correction to positional information

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.RecipeModificationReason.RotationalCorrection
member.summary: Correction to rotational information

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.RecipeModificationReason.VisionSystemCorrection
member.summary: Correction to information needed by vision system.

member.name: T:CFX.Structures.ResourceState
member.summary: Endpoint state model

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.ResourceState.Off
member.summary: Endpoint is Off (Shutdown)

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.ResourceState.On
member.summary: Endpoint is on but not engaged in any activity

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.ResourceState.Setup
member.summary: Endpoint is being set up for production

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.ResourceState.ScheduledDowntime
member.summary: Endpoint is down (scheduled / planned)

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.ResourceState.ScheduledMaintenance
member.summary: Endpoint is undergoing maintenance

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.ResourceState.Engineering
member.summary: Endpoint is being used by engineering for experimental / development purposes

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.ResourceState.ReadyProcessingActive
member.summary: Endpoint is performing non-value added work during production

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.ResourceState.ReadyProcessingExecuting
member.summary: Endpoint is performing value added work during production

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.ResourceState.Idle
member.summary: Endpoint is ready for production, but not performing any work

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.ResourceState.IdleBlocked
member.summary: Endpoint is ready for production, but cannot perform work because downstream process is blocking

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.ResourceState.IdleStarved
member.summary: Endpoint is ready for production, but cannot perform work because no units are available form upstream process

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.ResourceState.Bypass
member.summary: Endpoint is ready for production, but intentionally skipped or left unutilized because it is unecessary

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.ResourceState.UnplannedDowntime
member.summary: Endpoint is down (unscheduled / unplanned)

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.ResourceState.Sleep
member.summary: Endpoint is idle and in low power mode

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.SamplingMethod.NoSampling
member.summary: No sampling. All units are inspected (100% Inspection).

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.SamplingMethod.ANSI_Z14
member.summary: Units sampled according to ANSI/ASQ Z1.4 AQL methods.

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.SamplingMethod.MIL_STD_105
member.summary: Units sampled according to MIL-STD-105 mil standard.

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.SamplingMethod.MIL_STD_1916
member.summary: Units sampled according to MIL-STD-1916 mil standard.

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.SamplingMethod.Squeglia
member.summary: Units sampled according to the Squeglia AQL method.

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.SamplingMethod.FixedSample
member.summary: A fixed number of units were sampled (lot size disregarded).

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.SMTPlacement.SMDTapeFeeder.BaseUniqueIdentifier
member.summary: For multi-lane feeders, the unique identifier of the base. The UniqueIdentifier property should be populated with the unique identifer of the specific lane within the feeder (if so labeled). If lanes are not specifically labeled, both the UniqueIdentifer and BaseUniqueIdentifier prooperties should be populated with the same value.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.SMTPlacement.SMDTapeFeeder.LaneNumber

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.SMTPlacement.SMDTubeFeeder.BaseUniqueIdentifier

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.SupportedTopic.SupportedMessages
member.summary: If an endpoint does not support ALL CFX messages that have been defined for a given CFX topic, then it must explicitly list which messages is does support. An empty list implies that the endpoint supports ALL messages of this topic.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Symptom.Priority
member.summary: The priority of this symptom as compared to other symptom discovered for this unit. A priority of 1 indicates the highest priority.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Test.UniqueIdentifier
member.summary: A unique indentifier describing a particular instance of a test that was undertaken. Each new occurrence or recurrence of this same inspection gets a new unique identifier.

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Test.TestProcedure
member.summary: Procedure to be followed to perform this test (primarily for human driven test).

member.name: P:CFX.Structures.Test.Error
member.summary: In the case that the test cannot be completed, the error that was the cause of this outcome.

member.summary: The test was performed by automated equipment / device

member.summary: The result of a test

member.summary: The test passed

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.TestResult.Failed
member.summary: The test failed

member.summary: The test could not be completed because an error occurred.

member.summary: The test was aborted by the operator / user.

member.summary: The validation has succeeded

member.summary: The validation has failed (not succeeded)

member.name: T:CFX.Structures.ValidationType
member.summary: Types of validations

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.ValidationType.UnitRouteValidation
member.summary: A validation that ensures a unit is at the proper step in the route, and has completed all pre-requisite steps.

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.ValidationType.UnitStatusValidation
member.summary: A validation that ensures a unit is not in a failed or error condition

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.ValidationType.UnitAndSubsStatusValidation
member.summary: A validation that ensures a unit and ALL of its sub-assemblies are not in a failed or error condition

member.name: F:CFX.Structures.ValidationType.All
member.summary: All known validations should be performed

member.summary: The work was completed, but with an undesireable result
